title: Blood Thorn
summaries: The Blood Thorn is a Hardmode magic weapon that summons three penetrating Blood Thorn projectiles upon use, which erupt from solid blocks and platforms to damage enemies in a circular area around the player's cursor. Blood Thorns can pierce an unlimited number of enemies and linger for approximately 1.5 seconds before dissipating. If a solid block obstructs the line of sight between the player and the cursor, then Blood Thorn projectiles are instead summoned from a circle around the obstruction point, facing the cursor.

If no solid, valid tiles are detected within a circular area around the cursor (i.e. the player is both in midair and targeting a point in midair, or when there are no valid tiles for summoning Blood Thorns around the cursor), then they are summoned from the player's hitbox instead. The Blood Thorn has a 1/8 (12.5%) chance of being dropped by the Hemogoblin Shark.

statistics.Tooltip: Summons blood thorns from the ground
